enhanced_description: MCAP Consulting is a Singapore-headquartered search and recruitment business specializing in connecting people with opportunities. They pride themselves on building vast networks and strong relationships to win business. MCAP Consulting provides customized recruitment solutions for clients across diverse domains, including Financial Services, Consulting, Sales & Marketing, Shipping & Logistics, FMCG, and Technology. Their services encompass both Permanent and Executive Search Recruitment, operating on both retained and contingent search models. Key offerings include contingency searches, talent mapping, and project-based engagements, all aimed at boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
